cause.description:
i think we should start a gang in the county just for shits the pigs round hear are dumb as fuck and if a large group of people were band as a gang any illegal activitys such as what ever u kind people do in this wonderfull county. would not be as easy to pin to one individual there for u could get away with alot more shit. and the police can not just throw all of u in jail for no reason take great advantage of this people u could make good money.... just be aware there is safety in numbers .... so lets do this shit up ...THATS HOW WE ROLL
1. fuck the police
cause.mission: start a gang in the county
cause.name: county gang
